Sentencas: Direct carbon solid oxide fuel cells (DC-SOFCs) can directly utilize solid carbon to generate electricity.
Titulo: Experimental and numerical study of micro-tubular direct carbon solid oxide fuel cell fueled by the oilseed rape straw-derived biochar

Sentencas: However, the fuel cells' carbon fuel sources and configuration may significantly affect their electrochemical performance.
Titulo: Experimental and numerical study of micro-tubular direct carbon solid oxide fuel cell fueled by the oilseed rape straw-derived biochar

Sentencas: In this work, we systematically investigate the electrochemical performance of the micro-tubular DC-SOFC (MTDC-SOFC) using the oilseed rape straw (ORS)-derived biochar by experimental and simulation numerical studies.
Titulo: Experimental and numerical study of micro-tubular direct carbon solid oxide fuel cell fueled by the oilseed rape straw-derived biochar

Sentencas: For the first time, the ORS biochar is introduced in DC-SOFCs to improve electrochemical performance.
Titulo: Experimental and numerical study of micro-tubular direct carbon solid oxide fuel cell fueled by the oilseed rape straw-derived biochar

Sentencas: As expected, the single cell delivers the best output of 222 mW cm-2 at 850 degrees C, which is comparable to that of hydrogen-fueled SOFC.
Titulo: Experimental and numerical study of micro-tubular direct carbon solid oxide fuel cell fueled by the oilseed rape straw-derived biochar

Sentencas: Besides, the MT-DC-SOFC exhibits a long operating lifetime of 11.9 h under a 100 mA constant current with the fuel utilization of 23.8% at 850 degrees C, verifying that the ORS biochar is an excellent carbon fuel for DC-SOFCs.
Titulo: Experimental and numerical study of micro-tubular direct carbon solid oxide fuel cell fueled by the oilseed rape straw-derived biochar

Sentencas: Moreover, multi-physical field modeling is applied to evaluate the mechanism of the MT-DC-SOFC.
Titulo: Experimental and numerical study of micro-tubular direct carbon solid oxide fuel cell fueled by the oilseed rape straw-derived biochar

Sentencas: The simulation results verify the experimental findings that the cell performance is significantly affected by the electrolyte with finger-like pores, carbon fuel location and area, and electrode thickness.
Titulo: Experimental and numerical study of micro-tubular direct carbon solid oxide fuel cell fueled by the oilseed rape straw-derived biochar

Sentencas: This work presents a novel green strategy for developing high-performance MT-DC-SOFCs that can efficiently utilize the ORS biochar and other biomass.
Titulo: Experimental and numerical study of micro-tubular direct carbon solid oxide fuel cell fueled by the oilseed rape straw-derived biochar
